name: Legal Risk Exposure Report
query:
SELECT
    lc.risk_level AS "Risk Level::100",
    COUNT(lc.name) AS "Number of Cases::120",
    SUM(lc.potential_liability) AS "Total Potential Liability:Currency:150",
    GROUP_CONCAT(lc.case_number) AS "Cases::300"
FROM `tabLegal Case` lc
WHERE
    lc.case_status IN ('Open', 'Hearing')
GROUP BY lc.risk_level
ORDER BY
    FIELD(lc.risk_level, 'High', 'Medium', 'Low');
